attributes.action: Honour Dr Chad Varah's memory with Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
DR Chad Varah is a name known by few however he launched the Samaritan's from the crypt of St Luke's Church, in the city of London, in 1953. 

He has died aged 95 and I think he should be honoured as his simple idea has saved and helped countless people.
